{{also|Fertig|-fertig}} ==German== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|fertec}}, from {{inh|de|goh|fartīg}}, from the noun {{m|goh|fart||journey}}. Cognate with {{cog|nl|vaardig}}, {{cog|nds|fardig}}, {{cog|ang|fierd||expedition, campaign}}.
